title: Job Title: Head of Engineering (Machine Learning Specialist) for Recipe Platform Startup - Contract to Hire
required_skills:
AI App Development, 
AI Implementation, 
Computer Vision, 
Supervised Learning,

description:
We are a dynamic start-up called Foodable (https://www.foodableapp.com/) on a mission to revolutionize how people cook at home. Our vision is to create a cutting-edge recipe platform that harnesses the power of machine learning to provide users with user generated recipes from around the world based on their ingredients and leftovers.

We're seeking a passionate and experienced individual to become our Head of Engineering. They will be someone that specializes in machine learning to spearhead the development as well as help build and lead a talented team of developers in bringing this vision to life.

Responsibilities:

Lead the development of our machine learning-powered recipe platform from concept to deployment.

Design and implement scalable and efficient algorithms for ingredient recognition, recipe recommendation, and user personalization.

Oversee and manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring alignment with business objectives and timelines.

Develop and communicate project goals, deliverables, and milestones to the engineering team, ensuring clarity and accountability.

Delegate tasks effectively, leveraging the strengths of individual team members to maximize efficiency and productivity.

Set clear project priorities and allocate resources appropriately to meet project deadlines and quality standards.

Monitor and track project progress, identifying and mitigating risks and bottlenecks to ensure timely delivery.

Foster a culture of continuous improvement and innovation within the engineering team, encouraging feedback and implementing process improvements as needed.

Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of engineering efforts with product development and business operations.

Stay ahead of the latest advancements in machine learning and recommend innovative solutions to enhance our platform's capabilities.

Requirements

Proven track record of leading successful engineering teams in developing and deploying machine learning-based products.

Deep understanding of machine learning algorithms and techniques, with hands-on experience in training and deploying models.

Proficiency in Python and relevant machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).

Strong communication and leadership skills, with the ability to articulate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience in building recommendation systems or natural language processing (NLP) applications.

Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).

Passion for food and cooking is a plus!

Note: Please include examples of your previous work and any relevant GitHub repositories or technical blogs/portfolio links in your application. We look forward to hearing from you!
